actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works.

official_title: A bill to require that an increase made by the Tennessee Valley Authority in its rates for power be made on the basis of proceedings which give an opportunity for oral hearings.

summary.text: Requires that an increase made by the Tennessee Valley Authority in its rates for power be made on the basis of proceedings which give an opportunity for oral hearings. (Amends 16 U.S.C. 831n-4(f))

titles.title: A bill to require that an increase made by the Tennessee Valley Authority in its rates for power be made on the basis of proceedings which give an opportunity for oral hearings.
